page.title: 09ST MARY'S EDUCATION
page.content: {EDUCATION} SECONDARY SCHOOL There are 139 pupils in the school including 27 off islanders.There are 12.2 teachers.The headmaster teaches ten lessons of maths to the second year. 5 lessons of science to the 1st year.Two lessons of music to the 2nd year. 4 lessons of RE to the 4th and 5th years.2 lessons of careers to the 5th year.27 will be leaving this year.They are all going to college or the 6th year.The school is 18 years old.It was built as a secondary modern for those not passing the 11+ exam.(those passing went to Truro school at 11 years of age).{THE {BOARDING HOUSE}.There are 27 people in the boarding house 13 girls and 14 boys.There are about 4 special activities they are pool, table football,darts and a television.
